name: GRAPPLE the Abyss!
description:
Why don't your legs work? Who knows. At least you have your grappling hook to get around.  Can you make it to the bottom and face your ████?

Tested with Chrome and Firefox.  

Game crashed? I  will love you forever if you can open up the browser dev console and send me a screenshot of the error stack trace at   https://twitter.com/lectvs  :)

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows -  Grapple
  • ESC - Pause
  • F - Fullscreen

Tools Used:

  • pixi.js 
  • WebAudio API
  • Paint.NET 
  • PyxelEdit 
  • sfxia
  • SFXR
  • Renoise

Originally made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48:   https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/grapple-the-abyss
